predicate.note: Frames file for 'rein' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

roleset.name: to stop, slow up or control

example.name: transitive
example.text: If he were able [*-1] to construct a popular and efficient corporatist system , he or his heir would be wellplaced [*-2] to rein in political opposition , and to re-establish control in Eastern Europe .
